title: Dawn of Destiny
description: Winner of New Apple Literary's BEST NEW FICTION and AUDIOBOOK OF THE YEAR,  Dawn of Destiny  sets the stage for an adrenaline-fueled series in the vein of  Starship Troopers  and Michael Crichton's  Sphere . Scott Remington had a plan. God had a different one. Fresh off the heels of first contact with hostile extraterrestrials, Scott joins the Earth Defense Network in the fight to protect humanity. Little does he realize that it will take but one fateful decision on the battlefield to both thrust him to the heights of success and plunge him into the darkness of doubt and disbelief.
author: Lee Stephen
